advice: Keep your schedule the same, 10-6 is work
breakup each day between job hunt, coding challenges, learning a new tech, ongoing project
having regular standup with your colleagues will keep you motivated and accountable
subscribe to lots of podcasts, Web Dev 101, Syntax, HTML all the things, Laracasts, Ruby on Rails Podcast, Python Bytes, etc.
Do free work for friends to build your portfolio and experience
Make a mock agency with your colleagues to build experience you can put on resume... '831 Digital'
Worry less about the specific framework than understanding it's role in the greater tech stack
Mastering the language is more important than master any language or library
